PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-03592012-03-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAggregate borrowing limit
PrecisOrder specifying $315 BILLION AS THE AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF MONEY THAT THE MINISTER OF FINANCE MAY BORROW in the period beginning on April 1, 2012 and ending on March 31, 2013 through the issue of bonds, notes and treasury bills.
AttachmentsAttachment
